name: 游戏：异星
description:
Game plot: In modern times, the protagonist is an ordinary student who tells the student that he has no outstanding looks and no outstanding grades just like others. At this moment, a girl in the game enters his life. The girl has Self-consciousness, slowly, the girl adapted to the days with the protagonist, and the protagonist...

This game is a love game

This game is a story-oriented game

This game has three endings
